item.description:
Let's go out to Capri Seaside Restaurant prior to seeing the Comedy Show. Even if your not going to the Comedy show, please join us.

Capri is a great Italian restaurant and the staff are great. If you would like to see their menu please check out their website: http://www.northshorepavilion.com/capri-restaurant-salisbury.html

We will need to make reservations for this event, so if you sign up for the event and then your plans change, please update your RSVP as soon as possible.

Please remember to bring the Meetup Cell (978-304-2811) with you in case you are running late, or can not find us.

If you haven't paid your dues for this year, please consider paying one of the organizers at this event.

Bad weather could cancel this event, so please check back on the site prior to leaving for the event. The organizers will make every attempt to cancel at least one hour in advance of the start time of the event.

Hope to see you at Capri

Donna & Janet
item.name: Capri Seaside Grille in Salisbury MA
